title: Haidou!
description:
Description :
        A comedy of two girls exploring an abandoned road!Yukina Masanaga, a transfer student, is called the "Snow Princess. She is a very quiet girl, but when she talks about "abandoned roads", she bursts into a smile! In order to see such a cute smile on her face. Ringo and Yukina explore the "abandoned road" together..!A story of girls who are passionate about abandoned roads

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: Abandoned Road At Mount Takao Interchange
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Abandoned Mountain Road. Old National Road 20
